name: view-transitions-polyfill
description: A polyfill for the View Transitions API.

scripts.test: npm run test-setup && cd test && cd wpt && python wpt run --no-enable-webtransport-h3 --log-mach=- --headless --log-wptreport ../report/report.json --log-wptscreenshot ../report/screenshots.txt --log-html ../report/index.html --inject-script ../../dist/view-transitions-polyfill.js firefox css/css-view-transitions
scripts.test-always-polyfill: npm run test-setup-always-polyfill && cd test && cd wpt && python wpt run --no-enable-webtransport-h3 --log-mach=- --headless --log-wptreport ../report/report.json --log-wptscreenshot ../report/screenshots.txt --log-html ../report/index.html --inject-script ./../test/dist/view-transitions-polyfill.js firefox css/css-view-transitions
scripts.test-debug: npm run test-setup && cd test && cd wpt && echo Default location of debug server: http://web-platform.test:8000/ && python wpt serve --inject-script ./../dist/view-transitions-polyfill.js

author: demarketed <demarketed@gmail.com>
